Entity.Description: This table stores the information about the work orders to be done at a node on an inventory item or a license plate.
Entity.Name: Work_Order

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_WORK_ORDER table.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The pipeline associated with this work order. This is determined by the document type and several other key attributes of the work order.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: The node associated with this work order, where work orders would be executed.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order number. Identifies a work order within the context of a node and enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_No

Attribute.Description: The document type for this work order.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the service item group on this work order.
Attribute.Name: Service_Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the purpose for the work order.
Attribute.Name: Purpose

Attribute.Description: The code of the enterprise to which the item or license plate belongs.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the service item on this work order.
Attribute.Name: Service_Item_ID

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the service item.
Attribute.Name: Service_Uom

Attribute.Description: An integer priority. Requests will be processed in the order of this priority.
Attribute.Name: Priority

Attribute.Description: The date a task should not start earlier than. Pass through fields to be stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Start_No_Earlier_Than

Attribute.Description: The date a task should not finish later than. Pass through fields to be stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Finish_No_Later_Than

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the LPN type for the work order. Valid values are:
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The number identifier for the case or pallet.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The item identifier for this work order.
Attribute.Name: Item_ID

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the item.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The product class of an item.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the segment type. Valid values are: - MTO : Made To Order - MTC : Made To Customer.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory involved in the work order belongs.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The date before which a time-sensitive inventory must be shipped out.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: This field identifies the tag attributes of the item involved in the work order.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: This field identifies a serial number for the serialized item involved in the work order.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: The order that is associated with this work order.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The order line associated with this work order.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment associated with this work order.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The status of the work order.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The date and time when the last status change took place.
Attribute.Name: Status_Date

Attribute.Description: The original quantity requested.
Attribute.Name: Original_Quantity_Requested

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which the work order is created.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Requested

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which the work order is created based on service lines.
Attribute.Name: Computed_Requested_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which the work order is created.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Requested_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity released.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Released

Attribute.Description: The quantity removed due to exceptions.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Removed

Attribute.Description: The quantity that was allocated.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Allocated

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which work order is completely confirmed.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Completed

Attribute.Description: Total weight allocated by appointments.
Attribute.Name: Allocated_Weight

Attribute.Description: Total volume allocated by appointments.
Attribute.Name: Allocated_Volume

Attribute.Description: Volume Unit of Measure.
Attribute.Name: Volume_Uom

Attribute.Description: Weight Unit of Measure.
Attribute.Name: Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: Total volume of products being delivered.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume

Attribute.Description: Total weight of products being delivered.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight

Attribute.Description: The activity code against which inventory needs to be updated.
Attribute.Name: Inv_Upd_Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: The reason code indicating the reason for the work order to get cancelled.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The reason text indicating the reason entered by user while cancelling the work order.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: The buyer organization for which the work order is placed.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The seller organization for which the work order is placed.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization which provides services on the work order. For PS work orders, this will be node's owner.
Attribute.Name: Provider_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The customer's location key where a service will be performed when the ServiceItemGroupCode is PS.
Attribute.Name: Service_Location_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the kit code for this work order. Valid values are: - PK : Physical Kit - DPK : Dynamic Physical Kit.
Attribute.Name: Kit_Code

Attribute.Description: The order number of the order with which the work order is associated.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment number of the shipment with which the work order is associated.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The promised start date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service work order.
Attribute.Name: Promised_Appt_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The promised end date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service work order.
Attribute.Name: Promised_Appt_End_Date

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the next time the work order would be considered for monitoring.
Attribute.Name: Next_Alert_Ts

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the requested quantity is overridden.
Attribute.Name: Is_Quantity_Requested_Overridden

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether all products that are associated to the DS line will be included in the work order.
Attribute.Name: OverrideProductsToBeDelivered

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the work order can have multiple appointments.
Attribute.Name: Is_Multi_Appt_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether work order planning has been completed.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planning_Complete

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the status of the pre-call process.
Attribute.Name: Pre_Call_Status

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the execution of the work order has ended.
Attribute.Name: Open_Work_Order_Flag

Attribute.Description: The preferred resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Preferred_Resource_Pool_Id

Attribute.Description: The preferred service resource.
Attribute.Name: Preferred_Service_Resource_Id

Attribute.Description: The time zone in which the work order will be executed.
Attribute.Name: Timezone

Attribute.Description: The service complexity level which indicates complexity of the work order, and is computed based on all service lines in the work order.
Attribute.Name: Service_Complexity_Level

Attribute.Description: This field represents the supervisor responsible for this work order.This will be a valid user ID in the system. This user will belong to the node performing the work order.
Attribute.Name: Service_Supervisor_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the work order has any non-resolved hold type.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Flag

Attribute.Description: The total value of the service items on the work order.
Attribute.Name: Service_Amount

Attribute.Description: The total value of the product items on the work order.
Attribute.Name: Product_Amount

Attribute.Description: Indicates the level of service required for this work order. Default from corresponding order lines.
Attribute.Name: Level_Of_Service

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creationg of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification or this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The use who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the taking of appointment can be delayed or not.
Attribute.Name: Delay_Appointment_Taking

Entity.Description: This table stores information about all the components required by the work order.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Component

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_WORK_ORDER_COMPONENT table.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Component_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order associated with this work order component.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for the item associated with this work order component.
Attribute.Name: Item_ID

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the item.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The product class of an item.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the segment type. Valid values are: - MTO : Made To Order - MTC : Made To Customer.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory involved in the work order belongs.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The date before which any time-sensitive inventory must be shipped out.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: This field identifies the tag attributes of the item involved in the work order.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: This field identifies a serial number for the serialized item involved in the work order.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: The component quantity per work order item quantity.
Attribute.Name: Component_Quantity

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores details of the inventory tag attributes for work order components that are tag tracked.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Component_Tag

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_COMP_TAG.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Component_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_COMPONENT.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Component_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique identifier.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: Lot Number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Number

Attribute.Description: Stores reference information for the lot number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Key_Reference

Attribute.Description: Lot Manufacturing Date.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Manufacture_Date

Attribute.Description: Any other lot attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute1

Attribute.Description: Any other lot attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute2

Attribute.Description: Any other lot attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute3

Attribute.Description: Revision Number.
Attribute.Name: Revision_No

Attribute.Description: Batch Number.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores details of the inventory tag attributes of the work order item that is tag tracked.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Tag

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_TAG.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique identifier.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: Lot Number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Number

Attribute.Description: Stores reference information for the lot number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Key_Reference

Attribute.Name: Lot_Manufacture_Date

Attribute.Description: Any other lot attribute.

Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute3

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.

Entity.Description: This table stores the list of activities to be performed to complete the work order.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Activity

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_ACTIVITY.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Activity_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: Activity Code.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: Identifies the sequence in which this activity needs to be performed.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Seq_No

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the entire activity is complete for the work order.
Attribute.Name: Is_Complete

Attribute.Description: Quantity completed on confirmation of this activity.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Complete

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores details on where and to what extent an activity is confirmed.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Activity_Dtl

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_ACTY_DTL.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Activity_Dtl_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: Activity Code.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for an Activity Location.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: Case / Pallet.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: Case Id or Pallet Id being built recorded as part of confirmation.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: Quantity Requested.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Requested

Attribute.Description: Quantity for which Activity is completely confirmed.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Completed

Attribute.Description: Quantity for which the Activity detail is released.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Released

Attribute.Description: A Serial number of the parent item.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the demand and the supply types for the work order.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Alloc_Cons

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_ALLOC_CONS.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Alloc_Cons_Key

Attribute.Description: Document Type for which the consideration is configured.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The Service Group to which the consideration belongs.
Attribute.Name: Service_Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: Type of demand, which needs to be associated with consumed components while work order creation.
Attribute.Name: Demand_Type_For_Consumed

Attribute.Description: Type of supply, which needs to be updated for the created item while work order creation.
Attribute.Name: Supply_Type_For_Created

Attribute.Description: Type of demand, which needs to be associated with consumed components while work order allocation.
Attribute.Name: Allocation_Demand_Type_For_Consumed

Attribute.Description: Type of supply which needs to be updated for the created item while work order allocation.
Attribute.Name: Allocation_Supply_Type_For_Created

Attribute.Description: Type of supply actually associated with consumed components after confirmation.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Supply_For_Consumed

Attribute.Description: Type of supply actually associated with the created item after confirmation.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Supply_Type_Created

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores work order status change audit. whenever the work order status changes because of a business process, an audit is posted along with the status, timestamp, reason code and text, user ID and program ID. All transactions in the work order pipeline in fact will have entries in this table upon completion of a transaction.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Status_Audit

Attribute.Description: Primary key.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Status_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key of YFS_WORK_ORDER.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: Status of the work order before the status change.
Attribute.Name: Old_Status

Attribute.Description: Status of the work order after the status change.
Attribute.Name: New_Status

Attribute.Description: Status date as recorded on the work order at the previous status change.
Attribute.Name: Old_Status_Date

Attribute.Description: Status date recorded on the work order at the most recent status change.
Attribute.Name: New_Status_Date

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of a transaction that was executed on the work order.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Id

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of a user who performed the transaction.
Attribute.Name: Audit_User_Id

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of an external Transaction reference.
Attribute.Name: Audit_Transaction_Id

Attribute.Description: Reason code indicating the reason for the status change.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: Free form comments that may be recorded during the execution of the transaction.
Attribute.Name: Comments

Attribute.Description: Unique key of the transaction. A transaction may have multiple api's.
The unique identifier for the context in which a audit record is created.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores Information on Buyer compliance to be done for an Item.
Entity.Name: Inbound_Vas_Compliance

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_INBOUND_VAS_COMPLIANCE table.
Attribute.Name: Inbound_Vas_Compliance_Key

Attribute.Description: Buyer organization code for which the work order is placed.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Enterprise code to which the item or license plate belongs.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: Item Classification for which Buyer Compliance is setup.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for the Service Item that needs to be performed on the item to make it compliant with Buyer's requirements.
Attribute.Name: Service_Item_ID

Attribute.Description: Unit of measure for the service item.
Attribute.Name: Service_Uom

Attribute.Description: Indicates the multiple of quantity in which a work order gets created.
Attribute.Name: Run_Quantity

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores work order attributes which were modified while excuting a transaction on the work order.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Audit_Detail

Attribute.Description: Primary key.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Audit_Detail_Key

Attribute.Description: Foreign Key to YFS_WORK_ORDER_STS_AUDIT.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Status_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: The name of the attribute that was changed on the work order other than the status of the work order.
Attribute.Name: Attribute_Name

Attribute.Description: Value of the attribute before the modification.
Attribute.Name: Old_Value

Attribute.Description: Value of the attribute after the modification.
Attribute.Name: New_Value

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores information about service lines included in the work order. Used only for PS/DS work orders.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Prod_Del

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_WORK_ORDER_PROD_DEL table.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Prod_Del_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order associated with this work order product delivery.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The product delivery sequence number.
Attribute.Name: Line_No

Attribute.Description: The product item identifier.
Attribute.Name: Item_ID

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the product item.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The product class for the product item.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The order line associated with this work order product delivery.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The product quantity to be delivered.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Required

Attribute.Description: The product quantity that was actually delivered.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Delivered

Attribute.Description: Indicates that the addition or modification to this line requires the current work order appointment to be changed. If the flag is maintained internally, it will be set to Y when a new work order is created, this line is added to a work order without appointments, or an appointment is no longer available due to addition of this line.
Attribute.Name: Cause_Appt_Change

Attribute.Description: The order header associated with this work order product delivery.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores information about appointments taken on the work order. Used only for PS/DS work orders.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Appt

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_WORK_ORDER_APPT table.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Appt_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order associated with this work order appointment.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: This number denotes the position in the sequence when the current appointment would be executed.
Attribute.Name: Appt_Seq

Attribute.Description: The last date when the execution of the service was attempted. This can correspond to either a successful or failed attempt.
Attribute.Name: Execution_Start_Time

Attribute.Description: The last date when the execution of the service was attempted. This can correspond to either a successful or failed attempt.
Attribute.Name: Execution_End_Time

Attribute.Description: The technician executing the work order.
Attribute.Name: Execution_By

Attribute.Description: The amount of time took to perform the service.
Attribute.Name: Execution_Duration

Attribute.Description: The promised start date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service or delivery service work order.
Attribute.Name: Promised_Appt_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The promised end date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service or delivery service work order.
Attribute.Name: Promised_Appt_End_Date

Attribute.Description: The appointment status. Will be in synch with the service order line. Used in case of provided service work order.
Attribute.Name: Appt_Status

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the resource pool associated with this work order appointment.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the service resource associated with this work order appointment.
Attribute.Name: Service_Resource_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the appointment taken is against a resource pool slot.
Attribute.Name: Is_Slot_Based

Attribute.Description: The capacity allocated for the service or delivery line.
Attribute.Name: Allocated_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The requested capacity for the service or delivery line.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The failure reason code.
Attribute.Name: Failure_Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The execution comments.
Attribute.Name: ExecutionComments

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the appointment is overridden. If passed as Y, available capacity will not be checked when blocking the appointment.
Attribute.Name: IsAppointmentOverridden

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the slot under which the current timestamp falls can be considered.
Attribute.Name: ConsiderCurrentSlot

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the resource pool on the appointment is firm. If it is, then system will not consider any other resource pool. Whenever Resource Pool is passed in the input xml, this flag will be set to Y.
Attribute.Name: Is_Firm_Predef_Res_Pool

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the service resource on the appointment is firm. If it is, then system will not consider any other service resource. Whenever Service Resource is passed in the input xml, this flag will be set to Y.
Attribute.Name: Is_Firm_Predef_Srv_Res

Attribute.Description: The expected start date of the appointment.Populated during route planning of provided service work order.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Appt_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The expected end date of the appointment. Populated during route planning of provided service work order.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Appt_End_Date

Attribute.Description: The stop number assigned during route planning, indicating the order in which this appointemnt will be attempted during the route execution.
Attribute.Name: Stop_Number

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the route planning has been completed and expected appointments dates and stop number were populated.
Attribute.Name: Is_Route_Planning_Complete

Attribute.Description: This field indicates items that were returned back and were not used.
Attribute.Name: Items_Not_Used

Attribute.Description: This field indicates items that were used, which were not originally requested.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Equipment_Used

Attribute.Description: This field indicates special tools that were used and then returned.
Attribute.Name: Non_Inv_Items_Returned

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the scheduler has to be notified and entered information is send to the scheduler.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Scheduler

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the sales person has to be notified and entered information is send to the sales person.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Sales

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that some problems exist with work order and it has to be looked at.
Attribute.Name: Attention_Required

Attribute.Description: This field indicates vehicle number that was used for job completion.
Attribute.Name: Vehicle_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates odometer reading at the time of appointment completion.
Attribute.Name: Vehicle_Odometer_Reading

Attribute.Description: This field indicates what were the problems with the vehicle that required service.
Attribute.Name: Vehicle_Service_Request

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.

Entity.Description: This table stores information about service lines included in the work order. Used only for PS/DS work orders.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Service_Line

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_WORK_ORDER_SERVICE_LINE table.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Service_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order associated with this work order service line.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The service line sequence number. Part of unique key.
Attribute.Name: Line_No

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the item group code. Valid values are: - PS : Provided Service - DS : Delivery Service.
Attribute.Name: Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the service item.
Attribute.Name: Item_ID

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the service item.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The order line associated with this work order service line.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The required capacity of the associated service line.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the service line is complete.
Attribute.Name: Is_Complete

Attribute.Description: Indicates that the addition or modification to this line requires the current work order appointment to be changed. If the flag is maintained internally, it will be set to Y when a new work order is created, this line is added to a work order without appointments, or an appointment is no longer available due to addition of this line.
Attribute.Name: Cause_Appt_Change

Attribute.Description: The order header associated with this work order service line.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores information about service tools included in the work order.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Service_Tool

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER_SERVICE_TOOLS.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Service_Tool_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WORK_ORDER.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for a Service Tool Item.
Attribute.Name: Item_ID

Attribute.Description: Unit of measure for the service tool item.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: Required quantity of the associated service tool item.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Required

Attribute.Description: Free form comments that may be recorded during the association of Service Item.
Attribute.Name: Comments

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the service supervisor for the combination of node and seller org.
Entity.Name: Wo_Service_Supervisor_Detmn

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_WO_SS_DETMN.
Attribute.Name: Wo_Service_Supervisor_Detmn_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of YFS_SHIP_NODE.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This can be any Seller Organization in the system. This may or may not be a node. However, in a retail environment, this is expected to be a node which is the store where the sale is being made.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The unique identifer that represents the supervisor responsible for the work orders originating from the seller represented by SELLER_ORGANIZATION_CODE and executed by the node represented by NODE_KEY. This will be a valid user id in the system. This user will belong to the node represented by NODE_KEY.
Attribute.Name: Service_Supervisor_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores all the hold types defined for a work order.

Attribute.Description: Hold type.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Type

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when this hold type was added to the order.
Attribute.Name: Last_Hold_Type_Date

Attribute.Description: The reason text indicating the reason entered by user while putting hold on the work order.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: Transaction which changed the hold type status.

Attribute.Description: Primary key.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Status_Audit_Key

Entity.Description: This table stores the Notes/customer contact information for work order.
Entity.Name: Work_Order_Notes

Attribute.Description: Primary key for YFS_WORK_ORDER_NOTES table.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Notes_Key

Attribute.Description: Represents the work order this notes/customer contact information corresponds to.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: Sequence Number for the record.
Attribute.Name: Sequence_No

Attribute.Description: The reason for which the notes are logged. Like "CustomerContact" etc. The values will be selected from common code of code type "NOTES_REASON".
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The actual notes.
Attribute.Name: Note_Text

Attribute.Description: The contact type like Phone call, email etc. The values will be selected from common code of code type "CONTACT_TYPE".
Attribute.Name: Contact_Type

Attribute.Description: If the notes were entered because of customer contact by phone, the phone no can be stored in this column. If the contact is by email, emailed can be stored here.
Attribute.Name: Contact_Reference

Attribute.Description: The time at which the customer contact occurred.
Attribute.Name: Contact_Time

Attribute.Description: The user who made the contact. The default value will the logged in user.
Attribute.Name: Contact_User

Attribute.Description: This flag determines whether the note applied should be visible to all users. This field is used for filtering. No logic is currently applied to it.
Attribute.Name: Visible_To_All

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores the list of users who worked/assigned for an appointment in the work order.
Entity.Name: Wo_Appt_User

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_WO_APPT_USER table.
Attribute.Name: Wo_Appt_User_Key

Attribute.Description: Key pointing to the appointment in the work order.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Appt_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of the user who is working on this appointment.
Attribute.Name: User_ID

Attribute.Description: By default, the users configured in the resource user table will be copied in to this table if the appointment is serviced by the resource. If any other user served this appointment then the overridden flag will be "Y".
Attribute.Name: Overridden_Flag

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid
